agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Higher Education TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Wednesday, May 1, 2019 PLACE: E1.014 CHAIR: Rep. Chris Turner HB 630 Hernandez Relating to the establishment of the Texas Promise Scholarship Program for certain students at participating two-year public institutions of higher education. HB 4208 Pacheco Relating to the enforcement of certain requirements regarding the transfer of course credit between public institutions of higher education. SB 16 Hancock | et al. Relating to a student loan repayment assistance program for certain full-time peace officers in this state. SB 1538 Menéndez Relating to the establishment of a career mentoring pilot program for certain students who are veterans. SB 1539 Menéndez Relating to the establishment of a pilot program for certain students who are veterans. SB 1680 West Relating to the approval of certain private or independent institutions of higher education to participate in the tuition equalization grant program. HB 3853 Walle Relating to the administration by the Texas Higher Education Coordinating Board of proposed biological and environmental research by institutions of higher education on private property. Notice of this meeting was announced from the house floor. Bills added after last posting: HB 3853 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
